source.1f8d786b:
import time
l1=range(1000)
l2=range(1000)  #created two arrays of size 1000

n1=np.arange(1000)
n2=np.arange(1000)  #created two arrays of size 1000 using numpy

start =time.time()
result=[(x+y) for x,y in zip(l1,l2)]
print("list time: ",(time.time()-start)*1000)        #using time library to check duration of execution

start1 =time.time()
result=n1+n2           #numpy is even easier to perform operations when compared to normal lists
print("array time: ",(time.time()-start1)*1000)

print(str(a2.ndim)+"-D Array")
